abstract: According to an article from Reuters, Verizon would be the latest to jump into the potentially lucrative business of streaming movies and TV shows.
snippet: According to an article from Reuters, Verizon would be the latest to jump into the potentially lucrative business of streaming movies and TV shows.
lead_paragraph: On Tuesday, Reuters reported that Verizon planned to introduce a service that would let customers stream television shows and movies over the Web. The service could be introduced as early as next year, according to the report, and would offer a limited lineup of movies and television shows.

headline.main: Verizon Is Reported to Be Planning a Streaming Service
